title: AnalogOutputGetFromPointNum (Method)
text:
METHOD AnalogOutputGetFromPointNum :
Error
Get the value of Analog Output datapoint (DNP3 object group 40 âanalog output statusâ) with given point number (0 .. MaxPointNum).
Returns PointNotExistent, if a datapoint with the given point number doesnt exist, OK otherwise.

rows:
Flags. Flag values are ORâdcombinations of the following:DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_ON_LINE - the point has been readsuccessfullyDNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_RESTART - the field device that originated thedata object has been restarted. This device may be the deviced
reporting this data object.DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_COMM_LOST - the device reporting this data objecthas lost communication with the originator of the data objectDNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_REMOTE_FORCED - the state of the binary objecthas been forced to its current state at the originating device

Time stamp reported - valid if hasTimeStamp = TRUE, invalid
otherwise.
